import { Meta, Story, Canvas, ArgsTable } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import Box from '../../components/Box';

<Meta title="Theme/Shadows" component={Box} />

# Theme Shadows

Theme shadows can be passed to any components using the prop `boxShadow`

<Canvas>
  <Story name="xs shadow">
    {() => (
      <Box
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent="center"
        size={100}
        bg="gray.2"
        boxShadow="xs"
        children="xs"
      />
    )}
  </Story>
  <Story name="sm shadow">
    {() => (
      <Box
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent="center"
        size={100}
        bg="gray.3"
        boxShadow="sm"
        children="sm"
      />
    )}
  </Story>
  <Story name="md shadow">
    {() => (
      <Box
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent="center"
        size={100}
        boxShadow="md"
        bg="gray.4"
        children="md"
      />
    )}
  </Story>
  <Story name="lg shadow">
    {() => (
      <Box
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent="center"
        size={100}
        boxShadow="lg"
        bg="gray.5"
        children="lg"
      />
    )}
  </Story>
  <Story name="xl shadow">
    {() => (
      <Box
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent="center"
        size={100}
        boxShadow="xl"
        bg="gray.6"
        children="xl"
      />
    )}
  </Story>
</Canvas>
